  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:leno_es_20070518_2_0050307</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>leno_es_20070518_2_0050307</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Las clases de palabras</string>
            <string language="en">Types of words</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typen von Wörtern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de mots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos de palavras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di parole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι λέξεων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Teoría en torno a categorías gramaticales. Desde su definición, a una descripción de todas las categorías gramaticales: sustantivo, verbo, adjetivo, adverbio, preposición y conjunción. Además, de cada categoría se presenta un completo desarrollo: definición, clases, metábasis, etc.</string>
            <string language="en">The theory of grammatical categories. It includes the definition and description of all the grammatical categories: noun, verb, adjective, adverb, preposition and conjunction. It also presents a complete explanation of each category, including definitions, types, conversion, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Palabras</string>
            <string language="en">Words</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Theorie der grammatischen Kategorien. 
Sie schließt die Definition und die Beschreibung aller 
grammatischen Kategorien ein: Gegenstandswort, Verb, Adjektiv, 
Adverb, Präposition und Zusammenhang. Sie stellt auch eine 
komplette Erklärung jeder Kategorie, einschließlich Definitionen, 
Typen, Konvertierung, usw. dar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La théorie de catégories grammaticales. 
Elle inclut la définition et la description de toutes les 
catégories grammaticales : nom, verbe, adjectif, adverbe, 
préposition et conjonction. Elle présente également une 
explication complète de chaque catégorie, y compris des 
définitions, des types, la conversion, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A teoria de categorias gramaticais. Inclui 
a definição e a descrição de todas as categorias gramaticais: 
substantivo, verbo, adjetivo, advérbio, preposição e 
junção. Apresenta também uma explanação completa de cada 
categoria, including definições, tipos, conversão, etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La teoria delle categorie grammaticali. 
Include la definizione e la descrizione di tutte le categorie 
grammaticali: nome, verbo, aggettivo, avverbio, preposizione e 
congiunzione. Egualmente presenta una spiegazione completa di 
ogni categoria, compreso le definizioni, i tipi, la conversione, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η θεωρία των γραμματικών κατηγοριών. 
Περιλαμβάνει τον καθορισμό και την περιγραφή όλων των 
γραμματικών κατηγοριών: ουσιαστικό, ρήμα, επίθετο, 
επίρρημα, πρόθεση και κλίση. Παρουσιάζει επίσης μια πλήρη 
εξήγηση κάθε κατηγορίας, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των ορισμών, των 
τύπων, της μετατροπής, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wörter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Palavras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λέξεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καστιλιάνος και λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
